speaker.bio: Matt is a front-end dev at Union Pacific Railroad.
speaker.title: Automate Everything with GitHub Actions
speaker.description: GitHub Actions are a new way to respond to anything that occurs on GitHub, and it's pretty amazing. You can use it to automatically run tests when you push new code, or publish to NPM if all the tests pass. But this is just the tip of the iceberg, let's automate everything we can (and some things we probably shouldn't).
